Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes the village of Port Chester to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to a certain police officer employed by such village
Summary: Authorizes the village of Port Chester to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to Michael Sprague, a police officer employed by such village since January 7, 2013.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the village of Port Chester to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to a certain police officer employed by such village
